text: The Uruguay national under-20 football team represents Uruguay in international football completions such as FIFA U-20 World Cup and the South American Youth Championship. They won the 2023 FIFA U-20 World Cup in Argentina. ==Competitive record== ===FIFA U-20 World Cup=== FIFA U-20 World Cup Record FIFA U-20 World Cup Record FIFA U-20 World Cup Record FIFA U-20 World
